page: MA61006: Pattern Recognition And Scene Analysis

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Probability and Statistics Pattern recognition, feature extraction and classification stages, different approaches to pattern recognition - Linear classifiers, parametric and nonparametric classification techniques. Supervised learning, unsupervised learning and clustering, digitization of images, introduction to image analysis problems, segmentation, edge detection and region growing techniques, contour description, elements of texture description and classification.
page: MA61006: Pattern Recognition And Scene Analysis
